findings.title: Confidentiality may be perpetual / indefinite
findings.rationale: Indefinite confidentiality can create long-term compliance burden and uncertainty around retention and disclosure.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...4. CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE Employee must maintain strict confidentiality of all proprietary information, customer lists, and business strategies indefinitely....
findings.exact_snippet: CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE Employee must maintain strict confidentiality of all proprietary information, customer lists, and business strategies indefinitely
findings.context:
ERTY
All work product, inventions, and intellectual property created by Employee during employment shall become the exclusive property of Employer. Employee hereby assigns all such rights to Employer.

4. CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE
Employee must maintain strict confidentiality of all proprietary information, customer lists, and business strategies indefinitely.

5. NON-COMPETE AND NON-SOLICITATION
Employee shall not engage in competitive business activities or solicit Employer's customers for 2 years following termination.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION
Emp

findings.title: Non-compete / non-solicit style restriction
findings.rationale: Restrictive covenants can limit future business activity; enforceability varies and is commonly negotiated.

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...10. GOVERNING LAW This Agreement is governed by California law, and parties consent to exclusive jurisdiction in California courts....
findings.context:
olved through mandatory binding arbitration.

9. ATTORNEYS' FEES
In any action to enforce this Agreement, Employer shall recover all attorneys' fees and costs from Employee.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by California law, and parties consent to exclusive jurisdiction in California courts.

This Agreement is effective as of October 1, 2024.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
